metadata.name: Escaping Time
metadata.description:
Bunny girl melts in the sun
Dancing, transcending time and form
Electricity in her veins, a blur
Merging with herself, forever transformed
A symphony of contradictions, eyes like stars
Guiding through the darkness, a mystery thus far
In the dance, the answer is found
A living work of art, forever bound
In the embrace of infinity, we'll dance
Becoming one with the strange, in a trance.

AI was used as a stepping stone, then each frame has been digitally painted and enhanced with effects.
